mapper.select: select taginfo.*,COALESCE(tabTmp.num,0) as article_num ,COALESCE(tabTmp2.num,0) as follow_num ,case when tag_user_info.user_id = 1 then '已关注' else '关注' end as tip from taginfo left join (select count(1) as num, tag_id from tag_topic_info group by tag_id) tabTmp on tabTmp.tag_id = taginfo.tag_id left join (select count(1) as num, tag_id from tag_user_info group by tag_id) tabTmp2 on tabTmp2.tag_id = taginfo.tag_id left join tag_user_info on tag_user_info.tag_id = taginfo.tag_id where tag_name like #{value}
